# WKInterfaceScrollPosition.top

**Case**

The top of the screen.

## Declaration

```swift
case top
```

## Enumeration Cases

- **WKInterfaceScrollPosition.bottom**: The bottom of the screen.
- **WKInterfaceScrollPosition.centeredVertically**: The vertical center of the screen.

items.description: The vertical center of the screen.
items.name: WKInterfaceScrollPosition.centeredVertically
